segments.text: I need help with my timesheet .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , no problem . Have you found the blank ones ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , well put your name on it after you have downloaded it off the company website . OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I understand what to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You fill in the hours and total them for the week . Have you ever used a 24 hour clock ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So after you noted the hours , starting at zero which is midnight , you just write down the minutes as a dot followed by minutes . Get it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just make sure you show your total , sign it , and turn it in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I thought you said this was easy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are a quick learner . I don't think you'll have any trouble with this .
segments.speaker: S2
